conclusion: Use conservation of momentum and kinetic energy to determine velocities after collision
Mass of ball P is 4m, mass of ball Q is m, initial velocity of ball P is mg/qB, initial velocity of ball Q is 0
Total momentum before collision equals total momentum after collision
Total kinetic energy before collision equals total kinetic energy after collision
Solve system of equations using momentum and kinetic energy equations
